### Description
**As a** [role]
**I need** [function]
""So that** [benefit]

### Details and Assumptions
* [Include all helpful information, details and answers to likely questions on this story]

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Given that [context]
When [certain action is taken]
Then [the expected outcome of action]
```
